content.text: I would like to live in a house with a yard for my dog to run around in.
I live in the suburbs so that I can be close to my family and friends, but I also enjoy visiting the city to see my best friend and play cello with her.
I like to go to the city to see my favorite bands play.
I love going to concerts! I go to a lot of rock and roll concerts.
I usually go to country concerts.
I don't listen to country music, but I love the energy of the concerts.
I like to sit back and listen to the music.
I like to dance and sing along.
I like to relax and enjoy the music.
I like to get excited and have fun.
I'm glad we have different preferences.
Me too! It makes the world more interesting.
